item.title: How are datacenters physically wired?
item.description: I sent this question to my team in Intel some time ago. I gave a run down on SDN, NFV and all things Open to the OpenStack new hires today.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my new, Hugo-powered blog. I have a backlog of articles to publish, so expect to see lots of material going up here in the next few weeks.
